titleStmt.title: A true and perfect copy of a letter written by the Lord Marquis of Dorchester to the Lord Roos
titleStmt.author: Dorchester, Henry Pierrepont, Marquis of, 1606-1680.

notesStmt.note: This edition is in a different setting of text than that which includes the words "Printed .. moneth" in title.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
